attributes.action: review unfair rules brought about by the Department of Health without doing a race impact assessment
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Department of health has brought about unfair rules to send back doctors and nurses of ethnic minorities without doing a race impact assessment. This clearly makes the NHS no longer an equal opportunities employer.Short term measures like these to cover up poor workforce planning in the NHS will certainly backfire and this will lead to suffering of the general public in the long run.
